newsitem.title: USA: Bemis Co to close two plants.
newsitem.headline: Bemis Co to close two plants.

text.p: Bemis Co Inc, a maker of flexible packaging and pressure sensitive materials, said Monday it will close manufacturing plants in Pepperell, Massachusetts and Memphis, Tennessee, as part of a consolidation of its multi-wall paper bag business.
Costs of the consolidation are expected to be in the range of $8 million pretax and include severance and facility closing expenses, Bemis said.

The cost of the consolidation will be offset by the gain on the sale of Bemis' packaging machinery businesses, which was closed in May, and therefore will have no impact on operating results for the second quarter, Bemis said.
Following the consolidation, the company will have four remaining multi-wall bag plants, Bemis said.
